articles.title: Scientists May Have Found an ‘Ultramassive Black Hole’ With a Mass of 30 Billion Suns - IGN
articles.description: Scientists have found evidence of an "ultramassive black hole" with a mass the equivilent of 30 billion Suns hidden in the heart of a distant galaxy.
articles.content:
Scientists may have identified an ultramassive black hole 30 billion times the mass of our sun hiding in an image captured by the Hubble Space Telescope.

articles.title: New research suggests Tyrannosaurus rex had huge lips over its teeth - The Guardian
articles.description: Contrary to depiction in movies like Jurassic Park, scientists now believe T rexes were not ‘toothy lipless things’
articles.content:
While T rex is often depicted prowling the landscape while sporting a toothy grin, its fearsome teeth may actually have been concealed behind a pair of thin, scaly lips, research suggests.
